description: Decimal expansion of neutron-to-proton mass ratio.
references: E. R. Cohen and B. N. Taylor, The 1986 adjustment of the fundamental physical constants, Rev. Modern Phys., 59 (1987), 1121-1148.
K. R. Lang, Astrophysical Data: Planets and Stars, Springer-Verlag, NY, 1991.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
